name: Qu-tros (itch)
description:
Qu-tros is Tetris to the 4th Power.

Qu-tros has alot more going on than Tetris. Up to 4 shapes fall simultaneously. There are about 75 different shapes. There are surprise items and obstacles. There are different objectives.

Qu-tros is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Tetris.

Also play Qu-tros free on the official website

https://www.entertainment-calculator.com/qu-tros

Qu-tros also available on Steam and Android.
